fields.name: Spinmetal
fields.description: A filigree of bubbled metal grown by wild colonies of Golden Age cytoconstructors.

fields.name: Sapphire Wire
fields.description: A favorite of Hunters because of its versatility, this wire is incorporated into almost all Hunter gear.

fields.name: Glass Shards
fields.description: Translucent shards of non-baryonic matter, trembling with contained energy.

fields.name: Ascendant Energy
fields.description: The boiling energies of the zero-point field trapped in a stasis capsule.
